intro: Jasione atlantica, commonly known as Atlantic Jasione, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It belongs to the family Campanulaceae and is characterized by its blue to violet flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. It has narrow, linear leaves and produces small, bell-shaped blooms. Jasione atlantica is often found in coastal areas and is valued for its ornamental appeal.
